content.title: Create a New Service
content.body:
1. From the Data & Services panel, expand Project Services.
  2. Click Configure New.
  3. Under the Data Storage section, select Import Excel File.
    Iris may take some time to open the Edit Object Service window.
  4. In the Import File window, drag the Recipients.xlsx file from the extracted files.
  5. After the file is uploaded, click Next.
  6. Ensure that Recipients is selected under Excel Sheet Name, and then click Import.
  7. Click Done.
